# nucim R package

nucim (Nucleome Imaging Toolbox) is an R package for quantitative
analyses of the 3D nuclear landscape recorded with super-resolved
fluorescence microscopy.

## Installation

The stable version is available on
[CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=nucim):

``` R
setRepositories(ind=c(1,2))
install.packages(c("nucim"))
```

Installation will take about 5 to 10 seconds. Tested platforms can be
found
[here](https://cran.r-project.org/web/checks/check_results_nucim.html).

The development version is available on
[github](https://github.com/bioimaginggroup). The development version
probably depends on the development version of bioimagetools:

``` R
setRepositories(ind=c(1,2))
install.packages(c("devtools","tiff","EBImage"))
devtools::install_github("bioimaginggroup/bioimagetools")
devtools::install_github("bioimaginggroup/nucim")
```

You may need to install additional libraries on your OS before you can
install nucim. E.g. on Ubuntu/Debian systems, please execute:

``` R
sudo apt install libssl-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev libtiff5-dev libfftw3-dev
```

in the terminal before installing nucim.

## More information

Description of the package and basic instructions can be found in:

- Volker J. Schmid, Marion Cremer, Thomas Cremer: Quantitative analyses
  of the 3D nuclear landscape recorded with super-resolved fluorescence
  microscopy. Methods 123 (2017), p. 33–46.
  [\[DOI\]](https://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.ymeth.2017.03.013)

## Contributors

This package is developed at the BioImaging group at the Department of
Statistics, in cooperation with the Biocenter, Department of Biology II,
both at LMU Munich.

- Main development and implementation: Volker J Schmid
- Developement of workflow: Marion and Thomas Cremer
- Input on specific parts: Barbara Hübner, Yolanda Markaki, Jens Popken,
  Lothar Schermelleh, Daniel Smeets

# Package index

## Main functions

- [`classify()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/classify.md)
  : Classify DAPI
- [`class.neighbours()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/class.neighbours.md)
  : Class neighbourhood distribution
- [`colors.in.classes()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/colors.in.classes.md)
  : Compute colors in classes distribution
- [`compute.distance2border()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/compute.distance2border.md)
  : Compute distance to border of classes
- [`dapimask()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/dapimask.md)
  : Mask DAPI in kernel
- [`splitchannel()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/splitchannel.md)
  : Split RGB channels
- [`spots.combined()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/spots.combined.md)
  : Find spots using information from two channels

## Functions on folders

- [`classify.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/classify.folder.md)
  : Classify DAPI
- [`class.neighbours.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/class.neighbours.folder.md)
  : class.neighbours.folder
- [`colors.in.classes.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/colors.in.classes.folder.md)
  : Compute colors in classes distribution for folders
- [`dapimask.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/dapimask.folder.md)
  : Automatic DAPI mask segmentation for folder
- [`find.spots.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/find.spots.folder.md)
  : Detects spots
- [`nearestClassDistances.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/nearestClassDistances.folder.md)
  : Find all distances to next neighbour of all classes for folders
- [`plot_classify.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/plot_classify.folder.md)
  : Plot barplot for classified images in a folder
- [`plot_colors.in.classes.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/plot_colors.in.classes.folder.md)
  : Plot for colors in classes distribution for folders
- [`plot_nearestClassDistances.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/plot_nearestClassDistances.folder.md)
  : Plots all distances to next neighbour of all classes for folders
- [`splitchannels.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/splitchannels.folder.md)
  : Split RGB images into channels and pixel size information
- [`spots.combined.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/spots.combined.folder.md)
  : Find spots using information from two channels for folder
- [`t_colors.in.classes.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/t_colors.in.classes.folder.md)
  : Test for colors in classes distribution for folders

## Plotting

- [`barplot_with_interval_23()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/barplot_with_interval_23.md)
  : Barplot with Intervals for two or three bars beside
- [`barplot_with_interval()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/barplot_with_interval.md)
  : Barplot with Intervals
- [`heatmap.color()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/heatmap.color.md)
  : Heatmap colors for n classes
- [`plot_classify.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/plot_classify.folder.md)
  : Plot barplot for classified images in a folder
- [`plot_colors.in.classes.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/plot_colors.in.classes.folder.md)
  : Plot for colors in classes distribution for folders
- [`plot_nearestClassDistances.folder()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/plot_nearestClassDistances.folder.md)
  : Plots all distances to next neighbour of all classes for folders

## Functions on files

- [`dapimask.file()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/dapimask.file.md)
  : Automatic DAPI mask segmentation for files
- [`find.spots.file()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/find.spots.file.md)
  : Detects spots for one file
- [`splitchannels.file()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/splitchannels.file.md)
  : Split channels into files and extracts size in microns
- [`spots.combined.file()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/spots.combined.file.md)
  : Find spots using information from two channels

## Deprecated

- [`classify.single()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/classify.single.md)
  : Classify DAPI
- [`classify.table()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/classify.table.md)
  : Count classes in classified image
- [`heatmap7()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/heatmap7.md)
  : Heatmap colors for 7 classes
- [`splitchannels()`](https://bioimaginggroup.github.io/nucim/reference/splitchannels.md)
  : Split RGB images into channels and pixel size information
